ygData.subject: Hail All
ygData.msgSnippet: Should have done this sooner ... been playing EQ since Christmas on Torv and though I have to say I have fun ... sometimes it can be irriating with some of the
ygData.messageBody:
Should have done this sooner ... been playing EQ since Christmas on
Torv and though I have to say I have fun ... sometimes it can be
irriating with some of the people ... I see that there are some guild
on the other servers that have been built and was just wondering if
anyone could tell me if they were still in place ... Have a real hard
time giving up a 47 wiz but I think it would be nice to play with
family and would like to try ... If u could please let me know what
guilds are on what servers and see if I can't hook up with some of u
in game ... til then ... Be safe and good killing always
